questions.q: What services do you provide?
questions.a: Full-service property management, tenant placement, rent collection, maintenance management, lease enforcement, inspections, compliance, owner reporting, and 24/7 support.

questions.q: What types of properties do you manage?
questions.a: We manage single-family houses, multi-family houses, apartment buildings and commercial buildings.

questions.q: What areas in New Jersey do you serve?
questions.a: Essex, Hudson, Middlesex, Monmouth, Somerset and Union Counties.

questions.q: How do I contact TPG Management?
questions.a: You can reach us at: 732-978-9390

questions.q: How do I get started with TPG Management?
questions.a: Contact us to set up a consultation. We'll discuss your property, your goals, and how we can help you maximize your rental income.

questions.q: What types of properties do you manage?
questions.a: We manage multi-family houses, apartment and commercial buildings, and single-family rental homes across New Jersey in Monmouth, Middlesex, Essex, Union, Hudson, and Somerset Counties.

questions.q: Can you help me find tenants?
questions.a: Yes, we handle all aspects of tenant placement, including advertising, thorough screening, and lease signing.

questions.q: How do you screen tenants?
questions.a: We conduct comprehensive background checks, including credit history, criminal background, employment verification, and rental history.

questions.q: Who handles the lease signing?
questions.a: We prepare and execute the lease agreement, ensuring all legal requirements are met.

questions.q: How do you schedule showings?
questions.a: We book all showings through our website and office phone to streamline the process.

questions.q: How is rent collected?
questions.a: Tenants pay rent online through our secure resident's portal, and funds are directly deposited into your account.

questions.q: When will I receive my rental income?
questions.a: Rental disbursements are typically made by the 10th-15th of each month.

questions.q: What fees do you charge?
questions.a:
1-4 units of 8% of gross rent collected
5+ units and commercial 6% of gross rent collected

questions.q: Who handles maintenance requests?
questions.a: We coordinate scheduling with tenants and trusted vendors to ensure timely repairs.

questions.q: Do you handle emergency repairs?
questions.a: Yes, we address urgent maintenance issues promptly to ensure tenant safety and property protection.

questions.q: Can I use my preferred vendors?
questions.a: Yes, you can provide us with your preferred vendor list, and we'll coordinate with them for repairs.

questions.q: How often do you inspect the property?
questions.a: We conduct thorough inspections during tenant move-in, move-out, and routine property checks.

questions.q: Who conducts the move-in inspection?
questions.a: A member of our team completes the move-in inspection to ensure the property's condition is well-documented.

questions.q: Will I receive reports from property inspections?
questions.a: Yes, detailed inspection reports with photos are provided to keep you informed.

questions.q: Do you handle evictions?
questions.a: Yes, we manage the entire eviction process, including sending notices, filing paperwork, and court representation.

questions.q: Are you knowledgeable about New Jersey rental laws?
questions.a: Absolutely. We stay up-to-date with all local, state, and federal rental regulations in New Jersey.

questions.q: What happens at the end of a lease?
questions.a: We coordinate the move-out process, including inspections, security deposit return, and preparing the property for the next tenant.

questions.q: Can I sell my property while it's rented?
questions.a: Yes, we can help facilitate the sale while maintaining a good relationship with the tenant.

questions.q: How do you keep me informed about my property?
questions.a: You'll receive monthly statements, yearly inspection reports, and regular communication from our team.

questions.q: Who do I contact with questions about my property?
questions.a: You'll have a dedicated property manager who serves as your main point of contact.
